Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball made his long-awaited return in Chicago's 125-123 preseason win over the Minnesota Timberwolves, playing 15 minutes and finishing with 10 points, one rebound, one assist, one steal, and one block.
Post-Match Reflections: Lonzo Ball expressed confidence in his ability to contribute meaningfully to the Chicago Bulls after his return from a knee injury.
Head coach Billy Donovan highlighted the uncertainties regarding Ball's usage and availability despite his return to health.
